website_summaries.verdict: The overall reception for the New Balance Fresh Foam Rise is a mix of both good and bad reviews. A lot of the runners like the comfort and the lightweight feel offered by the shoe. They also like the versatility of the shoe as it is fit for both long-distance runs and for casual occasions. However, some of the reviewers think that the shoe can feel a bit tight, which somehow constricts their movement.
pros: A lot of the purchasers report that the New Balance Fresh Foam Rise is very comfortable
The shoe provides a lightweight feel, say some users
Several of the wearers say that the shoe is fit for different occasions
The shoe provides a snug fit, according to a few runners
A lot of runners mention that the shoe provides a high level of support
The shoe is very responsive to varied surfaces, say some runners
A lot of the purchasers say that the shoe is very flexible
cons: For some runners, the shoe feels too tight
One disappointed purchaser states that the shoe had twisted his ankle

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and very loud
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these shoes. First, the soles are incredibly noisy when walking on a hard surface like wood or tile floors. Second, while the box says 10.5-2E, indicating a wide, it feels as narrow as a regular shoe. Third, the "fresh foam" under my sole is so ungiving that the rock-hard arch support just pokes uncomfortably into the bottom of my foot. There were also minor cosmetic manufacturing issues, such as glue visible at the front of both shoes. Overall, a huge disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Drax

customer_reviews.title: A New Balance shoe with no arch support; ugg
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight shoe I had purchased to put in rotation for marathon training. Nope; no way! First run after walking for a full day to have the shoe 'mold' to my feet a bit as some alluded to, around 5 miles in felt first metatarsal starting to scream like it had a few years back when PF kicked in. Was really hoping it would indeed mold some. Nope. Painful to run in. Had to return to inserts on this one while using these regular shoes to hang out in. Will stay with Brooks Revel and Hoka Cavu for real running.
customer_reviews.author: jim odellTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: the size is always consistent
customer_reviews.text: i know my size and wide measurement. i use nb running shoes, training shoes, skateboard shoes and golf shoes and they fit perfect everytime no matter where i get them.... the owner of nb was a foot doctor so he knew what he was designing. i used to have ankle and knee problems but after switching to nb, they have gone away.
customer_reviews.author: bass kid

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the most comfortable shoes right out of the box that I've ever bought. The uppers are a very porous cloth material that will really let your feet breathe. I just have to wait for warmer weather to wear them, but couldn't pass them up at the price. I've been wanting to try these fresh foam sneakers from NB, and so far they are great. Very comfortable and cushy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mariner

customer_reviews.title: Genuine? Not sure.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2e expected to be wide but come regular width. The fresh foam makes me question its genuineness? Cuz the prints came off after a few worns. Like that it s light. Like the color. Like the thickness of the bottom part.
customer_reviews.author: anucha

customer_reviews.title: Ran a little small.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were a gift for my son. We ordered his usual size in New Balance but for some reason these ran a little small. The were adequate though and he didn't want to order another pair so we used shoe stretchers to help and he says they are comfortable now. He has worn them every day since I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: My new beater shoe
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a new light weight walking shoe. These work great.
customer_reviews.author: Jared W. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Might be better as everyday shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought for running, but not slot of structure to the upper. It allows too much movement of my foot. The midsole is very soft and using them as everyday shoes. The upper is very breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Koi

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable shoes with a light weight feel.
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable for jogging and walking. They are very lightweight with a lot of cushion. I especially like the blue ones, they really look sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and light shoes. Looks good. I still need to try it for running but for day-to-day use, it’s awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Ferdi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love them! They are very lightweight and breathable, running is comfortable and solid, perfect for my mix of cardio and weight training
customer_reviews.author: bob789000

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable pair of New Balance shoe's, no complaints, fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gove

customer_reviews.title: Xmas
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son for Xmas. I haven’t heard from him but he really likes New Balance.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Spend more
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. a new shoe and my body still aches, never happened to me before.
customer_reviews.author: deo

customer_reviews.title: Durable, comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the most durable shoes I have purchased in a long time. I weigh 255 pounds and am 6 foot 6 inches. I walk to work 8 miles each direction and after a month these shoes showing no signs of wear except on bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These shoes where great! The padding in them wore down quick and it's already time to buy new. But I work in the health field so shoes usually dont last long. I always get compliments on how nice they look.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Kid loved them
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my 10yo who has boat feet. :P He loves them and says they're very comfy and cushiony.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable great deal
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my father in-law for work. But he using them on his free time. Definitely more comfortable then what he has had .👍
customer_reviews.author: Brijay

customer_reviews.title: These were great!
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable. Shoe wasn’t too narrow which is something I’ve seen with higher size shoes. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth DeCelles

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Everything was as expected! Very comfortable shoe will order again!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Toliver

customer_reviews.title: 17 year old young man approved!
customer_reviews.text: My 17 year old son loves it so much, when Our dog chewed one of the pairs, we ordered the same exact one again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very light comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I ever had and I had to get 2 pairs of them but I will say that you will freeze your feet off when it's cold
customer_reviews.author: William Blevins

customer_reviews.title: You said recommended this shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair of shoes for my son. Our whole Family has been using your balance for years.My son and I have problems with her knees and ankles these shoes are great
customer_reviews.author: jess rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I gave heel pain so needed a shoe with extra heel padding. These shoes do the trick!
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe! Especially for the price. The “Fresh Foam” sole is amazingly comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Herbst

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bright Colors
customer_reviews.text: The picture does not do justice! These are beautiful and my boy loves them
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Matney

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: New Balance fits me perfect. It's going to be walking which it feels good.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson  Tate

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and light weight
customer_reviews.text: awesome shoe, fits great to size. very, very light weight and comforable
customer_reviews.author: Emily

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's Fresh Foam Rise Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Soft. Smooth. Simple. The New Balance fresh foam rise running shoe for men sneaker for men provides plush cushioning, offering your feet mile-after-mile comfort. Loaded with technology that encourages your fitness goals, you can be sure to enjoy each step in this new fresh foam model.
